page.title: 19Sports and Leisure
page.content:
Two years ago a new Leisure centre opened in Saffron Walden. It is called the Lord Butler Leisure Centre after R.A. Butler who was M.P. for the town. There is a large 25m swimming pool with squash courts, tennis courts, basketball, saunas, solarium a bar and a cafeteria. It is also used by a playgroup for pre-school children.
The new centre became necessary when it was found that the River Slade which flows beneath Saffron Walden had eroded the ground beneath the old swimming pool which was in the town centre. The new centre is a mile out of town.
